price: Kuma waɗanda suke idan an tunãtar da su da ãyõyin Allah, bã su saukar da kai, sunã kurame* da makãfi.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّواْ عَلَيۡهَا صُمّٗا وَعُمۡيَانٗا
footnotes: * Idan an yi musu wa'azi zã su saurãre shi, kuma su yi aiki da shi. Bã zã su zama kurãme ba ga karɓar gaskiya, kuma bã zã su zama makãfi ba gaganin hanyar shiryawa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā dhukkirū biāyāti rabbihim lam yakhirrū ʿalayhā ṣumman waʿum'yānan
